simplified: 士为知己者死，女为悦己者容

pronunciation.pinyin: shì weì zhī jǐ zhě sǐ , nu:3 weì yuè jǐ zhě róng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shi4 wei4 zhi1 ji3 zhe3 si3 , nu:3 wei4 yue4 ji3 zhe3 rong2

details.simplified: 士为知己者死，女为悦己者容
details.traditional: 士為知己者死，女為悅己者容

meanings.value: a true gentleman will sacrifice his life for a friend who understands him, as a woman makes herself beautiful for her sweetheart
